mapper.sql: MENU_ID, PARENT_ID, MENU_NAME, URL, PERMS, ICON, TYPE, ORDER_NUM, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME
mapper.select: select m.menu_id,m.menu_name,m.url from t_role r left join t_user_role ur on(r.role_id = ur.rid) left join t_user u on(u.user_id = ur.uid) left join t_role_menu rm on(rm.rid = r.role_id) left join t_menu m on(m.menu_id = rm.mid ) where u.user_name = #{userName} and m.url is not null

select m.menu_id,m.menu_name title,m.url,m.icon,m.parent_id from t_role r left join t_user_role ur on(r.role_id = ur.rid) left join t_user u on(u.user_id = ur.uid) left join t_role_menu rm on(rm.rid = r.role_id) left join t_menu m on(m.menu_id = rm.mid ) where u.user_name = #{userName} and m.type = '0' order by m.order_num asc
